constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Riverside South Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 20/00415/HOU (Erection of double storey side and rear extension, loft conversion with 3no dormer windows and addition of Juliet balcony to front elevation.) to provide partial single storey rear extension with addition of three garden facing windows and bi-folding doors to internal side elevation and addition of Velux window to rear elevation
decision_conditions: The Council considers the proposed amendments to be material and as such, it is recommended that a S96A application for a non-material amendment is refused.
The RBK Environmental Health Officer raises no concerns regarding the discharge of Condition 11 (Plant Details).

The validation checklist has 'No' in time stamp photo, since we have received the site photos, please revise the validation check list with updated information. Please check the new local list in our website before filling the validation checklist.The new local validation list and checklists can be obtained via the council's website- https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications.
